english: It ' s well to choose a hotel near a cinema , because if you have a tendency to oversleep the bells will wake you up in time for the matinee
chinese: 挑一家紧挨着电影院的旅馆就好了，因为你若容易睡过头，日场电影的开映铃声会唤醒你。
